src:
Cedevitin brejk u Istanbulu, Krušlin kao snajper, Hopkins heroj, Miler Mekintajer na asistenciju do tripl-dabla
Da li je prekasno za tim iz Ljubljane?

06 Nov 2019

Za Cedevitu Olimpiju šesta je tek srećna! Posle čak pet uzastopnih poraza u Evropi Zmajevi su stigli do brejka i tako oživeli nadu da bi na kraju ipak mogli da obezbede plasman u TOP 16 fazu. Iako je sve u domenu teorije, Cedevita je trijumfom nad Darušafakom učinila da se u Ljubljani ponovo kuju planovi za atak na sledeću rundu – 76:72.
Konačno su izabranici Slavena Rimca odigrali evropski meč odigrali u skladu s realnim timskim kvalitetom. Dosta opuštenije nego inače i dobrim protokom lopte, a iako je ponovo bilo mnogo izgubljenih lopti (20), ovaj propust anuliran je s istim brojem asistencija, ali i velikom razlikom u broju uhvaćenih lopti. Cedevita je potpuno nadskočila rivala i imala čak 43 osvojena poseda, od čega čak 13 u napadu! Poređenja radi, Darušafaka je imala svega 26 skokova, od toga sedam u protivničkom reketu.
Posle uvodnih taktova utakmice izgledalo je kao da će Zmajevi doživeti još jedan neprijatni evropski poraz, jer je Darušafaka u ranoj fazi imala 11 poena razlike u nekoliko situacija. Reakcija gostiju je bila jaka i stvari su se brzo okrenule. Do prvog odlaska na odmor minus je spušten na šest poena, da bi tokom drugog kvartala Cedevita imala i osam poena viška (46:38)! U nastavku je Cedevita zahvaljujući trojkama Filipa Krušlina i Marka Simonovića otišla na dvocifrenu razliku (57:46), ali to nije bio garant mirnijeg finiša.
Darušafaka je uzvratila udarac i susret je dobio dramatičnu notu u kojoj su presudne uloge imali Mikael Hopkins i Kodi Miler Mekintajer. Američki dvojac uspešno je odbijao sve nalete protivnika i održao distancu dovoljno veliku da bi se obezbedio prvi trijumf.
U pobedničkom sastavu Krušlin je imao 17 poena, uz fantastičnih 5/8 za tri poena, dok je Hopkins dopisao 15 poena. Miler Mekintajer je apsolutno blistao i upisao dabl-dabl s 11 poena i 10 skokova, a samo jedna asistencija nedostajala mu je za tripl-dabl! Takođe je imao i četiri ukradene lopte. Jaka Blažič je imao 10, Marko Simonović tri, a Majk Cirbes četiri poena. Kod Darušafake Geri Braun je ubacio 17, Džonatan Hamilton 12, a Doron Lemb 11 poena.

EVROKUP - 6. kolo

: ABA LIGA – Cedevita Olimpija / Jurij Kodrun
text:
Cedevita's break in Istanbul, Krushlin as a sniper, Hopkins hero, Miller McIntyre on assists to triple-double
Is it too late for the Ljubljana team?

06 Nov 2019

For Cedevita Olympia, the sixth is just happy! After as many as five consecutive defeats in Europe, the Dragons reached the breakeven level, thus reviving hope that they could eventually secure a placement in the TOP 16 phase. Although everything is in the realm of theory, Cedevita triumphed over Darushafak to make plans to attack Ljubljana again in the next round - 76:72.
Finally, the selectors of the Slavic Rimac played a European match played in accordance with real team quality. Much more relaxed than usual and with good ball flow, and although there were many lost balls again (20), this omission was canceled out with the same number of assists but also a big difference in the number of balls caught. Cedevita completely outclassed rivals and had 43 possessions, 13 of which were in the attack! By comparison, Darushafaka had only 26 rebounds, seven of which were in the opponent's racket.
After the opening rounds of the match, it looked like the Dragons would experience another embarrassing European defeat, as Darushafaka had an 11 point difference in several situations in the early stages. The reaction from the guests was strong and things turned quickly. By the time of her first vacation, the minus was lowered to six points, and during the second quarter Cedevita would have eight points in excess (46:38)! In the sequel, Cedevita went for a double-digit difference (57:46) thanks to the triplets of Filip Kruslin and Marko Simonovic, but that was no guarantee of a more peaceful finish.
Darushafaka hit back and the match got a dramatic note in which Mikael Hopkins and Kodi Miller McIntyre had crucial roles. The US duo successfully deflected all of their opponents' strikes and maintained a distance big enough to secure the first triumph.
In the winning squad, Krushlin had 17 points, with a fantastic 5/8 for three points, while Hopkins posted 15 points. Miller McIntyre absolutely shone and scored double-double with 11 points and 10 rebounds, and he only missed one assist for a triple-double! He also had four steals. Jaka Blazic had 10, Marko Simonovic three and Mike Cirbes four points. At Darushafaka Gary Brown scored 17, Jonathan Hamilton 12 and Doron Lemb 11 points.

EUROPE - Round 6
